name: Khoavnguyen
body:
###KHOA VAN NGUYEN
khoanv@ucla.edu

(951) 588-7042


### PROJECTS
	Explode! with Friends 2015

Developed an augmented reality app for Android using Unity and Vuforia API.


#
	LLU Drug Quiz 2015

Created a quiz program for Year 1 Pharmacy students at Loma Linda University.


#
	Moonflower 2015

Designed a Unity animation with a hide-and-seek gameplay segment using Rain AI.


#
	Submarine Game 2014

Developed a WebGL game with complex rendering, a particle system, and oriented bounding box collision detection.

	
#
	“Rethinking the Tabbar” 2010

Helped creating a Firefox extension and algorithms to reorder tabs automatically.


#
	“Productivity in Multiple Monitor Setup” 2009 – 2010 

Developed an MFC program which captures mouse and windows activities.

Designed a Processing sketch for data analysis.



### RESUME
Link
